1426324764746977282.text: The fact of the matter is, over the past two decades, only one bill amending Section 230 has become law: my legislation, the Allow States and Victims to Fight Online Sex Trafficking Act, better known as FOSTA.

1426324762268250113.text: I hear more and more people asking for changes to how potentially illicit online behavior is regulated.

1426324758300401666.text: This decades-old statute prevents these entities from taking responsibility for censorship, privacy violations, and illegal activity ranging from child exploitation and human trafficking to international terrorism and extremist groups.

1426324756299669507.text: Americans are growing increasingly wary of the power wielded by massive technology companies and the outdated legal shield protecting them — Section 230 of the Communications Decency Act.

1426324753741238278.text: Over the course of this pandemic, isolation caused many people to turn to an internet ruled by just a handful of corporations for social interaction, political commentary, and vital public health information.

1025150954025480192.text: Today, @marcorubio and I announced our conservative paid parental leave legislation for working American families. For more information, visit my website: https://t.co/xNeyJrGE7H

1025088033668907008.text: Our legislation will expand freedom and flexibility, and make parenthood more affordable. These irreplaceable weeks, the relationships and peace of mind of our moms, dads, and children—these are the things worth fighting for.

1025087953234739200.text: Research shows that women who have paid leave are more likely to return to work after having a child. Families shouldn’t have to choose between financial stability and the well-being of their children.

1025087952043626497.text: We are the only industrialized country in the world that does not offer access to paid maternity leave. Without access to paid leave, parents face lower labor force participation and reduced lifetime earnings, despite needing a steady income then more than ever.

943208375101345792.text: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act is pro-family tax reform that expands the Child Tax Credit, doubles the standard deduction, lowers individual rates, and preserves the adoption tax credit and retirement savings options I fought hard to keep.

943208373348196354.text: Today, we are delivering on that promise and no media hyperbole or partisan backlash will change the bottom line. This bill cuts taxes for middle income Missourians, allows American businesses to flourish, and paves the way for an increase of good-paying jobs.

889888160511119361.text: @FRCdc "I ask for your help in spreading the message & recruiting cosponsors for this bill. This is a serious battle that can't be fought alone."

889887867257991169.text: @FRCdc "I’m optimistic, but I’m also painfully aware that Congress has unaccountably chosen to defer to mistaken courts many times before."

889887683333558273.text: @FRCdc "The question now is will Congress act to protect the innocent who are sold online or let my bill fall into oblivion to protect Backpage."

889886880501825536.text: @FRCdc ...and the federal government should be able to pursue criminal charges against websites that are recklessly facilitating the crime."

889886809404170241.text: @FRCdc "State Attorneys General should be able to enforce their sex trafficking laws; victims should be allowed to bring cases against websites...

889886456663199744.text: @FRCdc "I find it hard to imagine that if a business hosted a slave auction, the auctioneer could not be held criminally liable."

889885572050935808.text: @FRCdc "Congress obviously never intended Section 230, passed over 20 years ago, to create a lawless internet."

889885468992692224.text: @FRCdc "Section 230 also blocks states from bringing criminal cases against websites that facilitate trafficking."

889885253053161472.text: @FRCdc "Courts have construed Section 230 to mean that sex trafficking victims who have been sold on Backpage have no recourse against them."

889882502243995648.text: @FRCdc "Congress has consistently failed to ensure proper implementation of sex trafficking laws in America’s court system."

889882276141703168.text: @FRCdc "The venues of sexual exploitation have changed. But our laws remain stuck in time."

889881838050791425.text: @FRCdc "Despite all our rhetoric, sex trafficking in America seems to continue unabated."

889881492914044928.text: @FRCdc "This is an industry that controls women and children through violence, drugs, and trauma."

889880916377710592.text: @FRCdc "My top priority in Congress is to combat online  trafficking. I couldn’t be successful in this fight if I were alone, & luckily, I’m not."

647060625965846528.text: How essential the family has been to the building of this country! And how worthy it remains of our support & encouragement! #PopeInDC
